pullRequest.title: Close leaked I/O stream and remove unused codes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
Clean up unused codes and migrate to JDK8.
Modifications:


Remove unused codes.


Close leaked I/O stream.


Remove meaningless comments.


Other miscellaneous changes.


Result:


No unnecessary codes concerns.


No resources leak.

nodes.bodyText: You should delete this method, and move registerAsParallelCapable to the static initial block.

commit.message:
Remove unused codes, close leaked I/O stream

### Motivation:

Clean up unused codes and migrate to JDK8.

### Modifications:

- Remove unused codes.

- Close unclosed I/O stream.

- Remove meaningless comments.

### Result:

- No unnecessary codes concerns.

- No resources leak.
